channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No Fact-Checking and More Hate Speech: Meta Goes MAGA
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg has fully adopted the language of his former right-wing critics about what constitutes censorship.

item.title: Don’t Count Out Human Writers in the Age of AI
item.description: The appetite for AI-derived drivel isn’t as strong as many publishers would have you believe, and demand for quality content is growing.

item.description: As our week in Las Vegas winds to a close, here's a final look at the most clever, smart, and forward-looking tech at CES 2025.
